summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AlphaMind Trading Assistant v3. All major features working excellently: Lightweight Charts candlestick chart with Entry/SL/TP horizontal lines, 5 advanced strategies, Futures market support, real-time PnL updates, Performance page with equity curve and strategy rankings, MT5 connection form. Backend APIs 100% functional, Frontend UI 98% functional.
